transArray.content: The room is relatively small, but others are OK

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving us the opportunity to serve you. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel room. Due to the renovation time of the hotel, there is indeed a certain gap between the hotel room area and the newly opened store. Although the majong is small, it is The facilities in the room are complete, and the hotel rooms and public area supporting facilities can meet your daily living needs. We will continue to work hard and use our careful work to exchange for your peace of mind and comfort when you stay. All hotel staff look forward to your every visit. ,wish you a happy life. Hotel General Manager: Li Changxia
